const response0 = await client.search({
  index: 'twitter',
  scroll: '1m',
  body: {
    slice: {
      id: 0,
      max: 2
    },
    query: {
      match: {
        title: 'elasticsearch'
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response0)
